verses.verse: Who <S%H4310><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> who comes <S%H935><s%> from Edom, <S%H9000><s%> With garments <S%H899><s%> of glowing <S%H9144><s%> colors <S%H9144><s%> from Bozrah, <S%H1224><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> One <S%H2088><s%> who is majestic <S%H1921><s%> in His apparel, <S%H3830><s%> Marching <S%H6808><s%> in the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of His strength <S%H3581><s%>? "It is I who speak <S%H1696><s%> in righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> mighty <S%H7227><s%> to save. <S%H3467><s%>"
Why <S%H4069><s%> is Your apparel <S%H3830><s%> red, <S%H122><s%> And Your garments <S%H899><s%> like the one who treads <S%H1869><s%> in the wine <S%H1660><s%> press <S%H1660><s%>?

"I have trodden <S%H1869><s%> the wine <S%H6333><s%> trough <S%H6333><s%> alone, <S%H905><s%> And from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> man <S%H376><s%> with Me. I also trod <S%H1869><s%> them in My anger, <S%H639><s%> And trampled <S%H7429><s%> them in My wrath; <S%H2534><s%> And their lifeblood <S%H5332><s%> is sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> on My garments, <S%H899><s%> And I stained <S%H1351><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> My raiment. <S%H4403><s%>
"For the day <S%H3117><s%> of vengeance <S%H5359><s%> was in My heart, <S%H3820><s%> And My year <S%H8141><s%> of redemption <S%H9067><s%> has come. <S%H935><s%>

"And I looked, <S%H5027><s%> and there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> to help, <S%H5826><s%> And I was astonished <S%H8074><s%> and there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> to uphold; <S%H5564><s%> So My own arm <S%H2220><s%> brought <S%H3467><s%> salvation <S%H3467><s%> to Me; And My wrath <S%H2534><s%> upheld <S%H5564><s%> Me.

"And I trod <S%H947><s%> down <S%H947><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> in My anger, <S%H639><s%> And made them drunk <S%H7937><s%> in My wrath, <S%H2534><s%> And I poured <S%H3381><s%> out their lifeblood <S%H5332><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

I shall make <S%H2142><s%> mention <S%H2142><s%> of the lovingkindnesses <S%H2617><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the praises <S%H8416><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> According <S%H5921><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has granted <S%H1580><s%> us, And the great <S%H7227><s%> goodness <S%H2898><s%> toward the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Which <S%H834><s%> He has granted <S%H1580><s%> them according to His compassion, <S%H7356><s%> And according to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of His lovingkindnesses. <S%H2617><s%>

For He said, <S%H559><s%> "Surely, <S%H389><s%> they are My people, <S%H5971><s%> Sons <S%H1121><s%> who will not deal <S%H8266><s%> falsely. <S%H8266><s%>" So He became <S%H1961><s%> their Savior. <S%H3467><s%>

In all <S%H3605><s%> their affliction <S%H6869><s%> He was afflicted, <S%H9496><s%> And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of His presence <S%H6440><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> them; In His love <S%H160><s%> and in His mercy <S%H2551><s%> He redeemed <S%H1350><s%> them; And He lifted <S%H5190><s%> them and carried <S%H5375><s%> them all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old. <S%H5769><s%>

But they rebelled <S%H4784><s%> And grieved <S%H6087><s%> His Holy <S%H6944><s%> Spirit; <S%H7307><s%> Therefore, He turned <S%H2015><s%> Himself to become their enemy, <S%H340><s%> He fought <S%H3898><s%> against them.

Then His people <S%H5971><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old, <S%H5769><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%> Where <S%H346><s%> is He who brought <S%H5927><s%> them up out of the sea <S%H3220><s%> with the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> of His flock <S%H6629><s%>? Where <S%H346><s%> is He who put <S%H7760><s%> His Holy <S%H6944><s%> Spirit <S%H7307><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of them,

Who caused His glorious <S%H8597><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> at the right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Who divided <S%H1234><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them to make <S%H6213><s%> for Himself an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%>
Who led <S%H1980><s%> them through the depths <S%H8415><s%>? Like the horse <S%H5483><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> they did not stumble; <S%H3782><s%>

As the cattle <S%H929><s%> which go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> into the valley, <S%H1237><s%> The Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5117><s%> them rest. <S%H5117><s%> So <S%H3651><s%> didst Thou lead <S%H5090><s%> Thy people, <S%H5971><s%> To make <S%H6213><s%> for Thyself a glorious <S%H8597><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%>

Look <S%H5027><s%> down <S%H5027><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> from Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> and glorious <S%H8597><s%> habitation; <S%H2073><s%> Where <S%H346><s%> are Thy zeal <S%H7068><s%> and Thy mighty <S%H1369><s%> deeds <S%H1369><s%>? The stirrings <S%H1995><s%> of Thy heart <S%H4578><s%> and Thy compassion <S%H7356><s%> are restrained <S%H662><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> me.

For Thou art our Father, though <S%H1><s%> Abraham <S%H3588><s%> does not know <S%H85><s%> us, And Israel <S%H3045><s%> does not recognize <S%H3478><s%> us. Thou, O Lord, <S%H5234><s%> art our Father, Our Redeemer <S%H3068><s%> from of old <S%H1><s%> is Thy name. <S%H1350><s%>

Why, <S%H4100><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> dost Thou cause us to stray <S%H8582><s%> from Thy ways, <S%H1870><s%> And harden <S%H7188><s%> our heart <S%H3820><s%> from fearing <S%H3374><s%> Thee? Return <S%H7725><s%> for the sake <S%H4616><s%> of Thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Thy heritage. <S%H5159><s%>

Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> possessed <S%H3423><s%> Thy sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> for a little <S%H4705><s%> while, <S%H4705><s%> Our adversaries <S%H6862><s%> have trodden <S%H947><s%> [it] down. <S%H947><s%>

We have become <S%H1961><s%> [like] those over whom Thou hast never <S%H3808><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5769><s%> ruled, <S%H4910><s%> [Like] those who were not called <S%H7121><s%> by Thy name. <S%H8034><s%>
